评论详情: First off, let’s get grunge and Y2K straight. This is GRUNGE. It’s soft, cute and colors are perfect.  Y2K fashion is awful. Period. It was cropped, fitted, and bright colors.  Mic drop.

Really cute grandpa vibes thrifty sweater. I am 5'5' 135 pounds, usually size small if fitted, medium if regular fit, and large if oversized. I got a medium in this and it is regular fit but sliggghllttyy oversized which I like. So it fits like a M/L for me.  It is kind of itchy though. Maybe washing it will make it softer.

The package came partially opened, when I took the sweater out I could feel how cheap and thin the fabric was, and when I tried to put it on I realized the sweater smelled very strongly of vinegar. The sweater also runs very small, I am typically a medium but I ordered a large bc I like my sweaters oversized, and this sweater is still much too small. Will be returning, and will not buy again, nor would I recommend anyone else buy this.
Was on my daughters wish list so I purchased for Christmas. Not a bad guy but I did expect it to be a little thicker.

Well made, however color is not as depicted and size seems small.  Ordered large and am 125lbs and it is not big through torso. Not baggy and sleeves are quite long..Green color is army green..Overall this sweater is more like a sweatshirt in texture.
My daughter loves it
the sweater is super comfortable but the colours are brighter than i expected
I ordered the brown. It was not brown, but was blue and pink instead. Fit well and looked nice so I might just dye it.
Really enjoy this pull over sweater. Material is super soft and comfortable.

Hello! This is a review for the light brown sweater :o) Im 105lbs, 5’5”, and androgynous, for reference, and ordered a large. I would say the torso fits like a small—not that it isn’t baggy, but simply because it ends above my hips. And then the sleeves fit like a large. I threw it into the wash, but not the dryer, because Im nervous the torso will shrink even more!! I just let it air dry and it was still super soft. The design is pretty true to the photos besides some color variations. It’s not a super light sweater, but not heavy either. It’s one of those sweaters that you’d want to wear during late autumn/early spring when it’s breezy, but then you’d layer it when going out or wear it indoors during the winter. The material seems like it could unravel or get some holes if you’re constantly wearing it though.. So be weary of how often you wash it and what you plan to do in it. Otherwise, it’s pretty nice and cute. A great, warm, twee grandpa sweater :o)

评论详情: The sweater is super soft, and while I expected it to be a bit thicker, it’s very comfy. The sizing is fairly accurate. It has that nice knit feeling without being scratchy, and I’ve tossed it in the dryer and gotten it back out with no damage.

评论概述: Inaccurate colors for green and blue cow sweater
评论详情: Ordered the cow sweater in green and blue. Good quality on the weave of the sweater, feels soft. Slightly oversized fit. The colors in the picture are NOT the same as the sweater we received. The cow is a dark blue and white. The grassy hill is a very dark green and white (instead of a mid-tone green and darker green-gray in the picture). This means some of the trees are all-white instead of green as pictured. The sweater we received is nice, but we would not have ordered it if we saw an accurate picture.
Soft but fits really square??????strange.... .

The picture is very different from the actual hoodie. If you want a heavy grandpa hoodie like shown on the side, don’t buy this
